transcript:
Customer: Hello

Customer: Hello
Executive: India Mart se bol raha hu.
Customer: Ha Anirudh baat kar raha hu India Mart se account manager.

Customer: Ye hamara ek Rishab Stone Crusher ke naam se wo hai.
Executive: Ha ha aap baat hui ha ji Anirudh baat kar raha hu aap se to baat hui hi thi.

Customer: Ji account manager.
Executive: Ha to uske baad madam ki baat hui na Kajal ji se aap se baat hui uske baad aapne bola tha ki Uttarakhand mein hi kaam karenge Uttarakhand ke bahar mein hoga bulk mein order aayegi to udhar bhi kaam karenge to kuch din leads ko use karne ki baat hui thi aapki.
Customer: Unhone kaha tha main aapka refund kar rahi hu baki unhone aage apni complaint dalni thi uske baad kaha tha ki tumhare paas madam ka phone aayega aur agar maine inko bola tha na ki hum Uttarakhand ke bahar kaam nahi kar sakte to
Executive: Accha Uttarakhand ke bahar aap kaam nahi kar sakte Uttarakhand mein Uttarakhand ke liye Uttarakhand ke bahar kaam nahi kar sakte.
Customer: Jo ek baat bataiye na sir jo hamara kaam hai agar hum Uttarakhand ke bahar bhejenge bhi usme kiraya itna lag jayega ki uski cost badh jayegi sir.
Executive: Hmm correct thik hai.
Customer: To Uttarakhand ke bahar mat.
Executive: To jaise ye catalog host ho raha hai sir to usi time matlab ki jo sale person the unko apna bata diya tha ki main bas Uttarakhand mein hi kaam karunga Uttarakhand ke bahar.
Customer: Unko unko bataya tha wo phone tak nahi utha rahe mera Anuj naam hai na.
Executive: Accha phone kya naam hai unka?
Customer: Phone tak nahi Anuj naam hai Anuj.
Executive: Anuj ji ab call nahi utha rahe hain aapka aapne ye cheez pehle hi unko bata diya.
Customer: Call nahi utha rahe are maine pichle pichle ek dedh hafte se main unpe call kar raha hu keh rahe hain ki main visit karunga Haridwar office mein visit karunga Haridwar office mein ab to mera phone nahi uthana band kar diya unhone.
Executive: Thik hai aur ek question aur tha sir ki jaise catalog live hone se pehle catalog host jab hota hai na to live hone se pehle aapko kuch buylead ko star karna hota hai shortlist karna hota hai to main dekh pa raha hu ki aapne Uttarakhand ke alava sari jagah ki buylead shortlist ki hai Dadri Greater Noida Bareli.
Customer: Maine ki hai sir maine agar hum wo jo lead hai na aap isme check kar kar sakte honge ke humne bade order jaise ek kam se kam 1 lakh se upar ke jo order honge na un value ke liye sir.
Executive: Ha to matlab ki agar 1 lakh ke upar ki agar order hoti hai to fir bahar aap kaam kar sakte hain.
Customer: Meri baat sune hum unse contact karte hain contact mein bhi hai behavior unka accha nahi hota baat karne mein aur keh dete hain humne to koi lead dali hi nahi hai to ab kya hum IndiaMART ko fraud manne.
Executive: Nahi sir dekhiye ab ye to alag wajah ho gaya na ki jaise ki abhi bahar mein lead use kar.
Customer: Humne jitne bhi ab tak ke jitne bhi aapki lead aayi hai unse humne jitne bhi contact kiye hai na sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Unhone unhone sirf yahi jawab diya hai ki humne koi lead nahi dali.
Executive: Nahi to sir kuch leads pe aap apna to dekh pa rahe ho abhi.
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hai sir aap kuch buylead ko use karke aap usko just kar rahe hain.
Customer: Hume kaam nahi karna sir kyuki jo jo aadmi phone nahi utha sakta Anuj ko unse baat hum hume fayda kya hua hai ye batao na.
Executive: Wo to thik hai sir wo aap refund kara de aap aap hamari complaint register kare sir ji ji main wo to mention kar dunga aapko na to aap karenge.
Executive: Hmm hmm nahi aapka ye cheez to main jaise mention kar dunga sir main khud Anirudh baat kar raha hu aapko to maine apna number bhi diya tha na ki ye mera number hai aapko kuch pareshani to bataiyega to us samay to maine aap se jaise pucha tha ki buylead shortlist kaun kiya hai aap aapne ki jab agar aap bol rahe hain ki main bas Haridwar Uttarakhand mein hi kaam karunga to us samay aapne alag alag state ki buylead matlab kyun shortlist ki thi is samay to aapne bataya.
Customer: Unhone unhone profile banayi thi wo.
Executive: To wo shortlist bhi unhe unhone hi karwai hai.
Customer: Unhone hi puri profile hi unhone create kari hai pura account hi unhone create kara hai yaha tak ki item sab product wagera sab unhone create kiya hai humne kuch nahi kiya usme.
Executive: Accha accha accha.
Executive: Accha thik hai to matlab ki shortlist bhi aapne nahi ki hai aise aise.
Customer: Hmm ek second humne kuch nahi kara unhone sirf kaha ke is is tarah yaha yaha jaake is tarah lead wo karni hai contact karna hai unhone sirf ye bataya tha aur kuch nahi bataya hume.
Executive: Accha one second.
Customer: Balki unhone ye bhi bola tha ki agar jo ek mahine mein IndiaMART khud refund de dega ab aap dekh lo agar jo hum agar hum maan lo chalo hum bahar bhi jaate hain 1% ko Uttarakhand ke bahar bhi to hum hume kaun order dega itni value mein hum seedha rate badh jayega fir iska.
Executive: Hmm ek second dijiye rate badh jayega main aapko call back kar raha hu sir mujhe thoda sa do minute ka time dijiye discuss karke main aapko call kar raha hu.
Customer: Thik hai ji do minute mein call kar.
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for subscription.

- Sales representative not answering calls.

- Claims IndiaMART representative created profile.

- Claims leads are not genuine.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to register complaint.

- Executive will call back in 2 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after discussing the issue.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, sales representative
